name: AquaShot
description:
Water polo like you've never seen before.

Dominate the pool in short, action-packed sessions.
AquaShot brings gunfire to the water polo arena.

Online Multiplayer

Play with your friends whenever you want. AquaShot uses peer-to-peer multiplayer,
so you connect directly to your friends without passing through a server.

Your game, your rules.

Choose between 3 different game modes, ranging from pure sport to a thrilling gunfight.
